participant_1.background:
I enjoy the rush of speed and adrenaline when I'm riding my horse.
I enjoy sushi because it is delicious and healthy.
my favorite hobby is chess.
i have two children.
My favorite people are my kids, who I love to spend time with and watch grow.

participant_2.background:
I want to learn how to manage my diabetes better so that I can continue to enjoy my work and my life.
I like driving my red Impala.
my favorite team is the raptors.
i want people to think i am cool.
I am passionate about capturing the beauty of the world around me, even when I'm not feeling well.

content.text: Hi there, how are you doing today?
Hey, I'm doing okay.  I'm trying to learn how to manage my diabetes better so that I can continue to enjoy my work and my life.
I'm sorry to hear that.  Do you have any hobbies?
I like driving my red Impala and I'm passionate about capturing the beauty of the world around me, even when I'm not feeling well.  What about you?
I have two children, they are my favorite people and I love spending time with them and watching them grow.  I also enjoy chess and sushi.
Chess is a challenging game, I enjoy watching it but I'm not very good at playing.  Sushi is delicious, I love the variety of flavors and textures.
I agree, sushi is great!  My favorite team is the Raptors.  Do you have any favorite teams?
I like the Raptors too, they're a good team.  I also like the Blue Jays.
Nice, I like the Blue Jays too.  They're both Canadian teams, so I have to root for them!
